It's Portal 2. It's an amazing game. What else is there to say really?

Of course I would recommend to others! Its such a classic, I played this game when it first came out I was like 8 I think? But I loved the portal series, I just love all the puzzles and the STORY! There was tons of character development with Glados understanding who she was before she became Glados. Caroline was such an amazing side about Glados. I do wonder what happens after though, like where does Chell go to after the ending? When does it take place as well? I know that Half Life and Portal share the same universe, so will the two MC's ever meet? I would say I wish she took the portal gun but it will be pretty useless because it only works on moon rock material. I really hope valve release a Half Life 3 and Portal 3(If possible anyway). I love this game so much and I think everyone should give it a try. This game was PERFECT.
Liked how it completely deep fried my last brain cell

Better than portal 1 which is saying something and is more challenging

This game in short is a masterpiece. The storytelling is engaging and funny, the puzzles are not incredibly difficult, but still feel nice when you solve one. The characters are memorable and unique, and the story is great. Even now, years later, this is, in my opinion and in that of many others, one of the best, if not the best, puzzle game ever made. Highly recommended!
I hope I was helpful and I wish you a great day! :)
